meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a giraffe.
meanings.sent1: The tall tree in the park had a giraffish appearance.
meanings.sent2: Her long neck made her look giraffish among her friends.
meanings.sent3: The giraffish lamp in the room made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His awkward dance moves were giraffish, but endearing.
meanings.sent5: The giraffish pattern on her dress stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a giraffe.
meanings.sent1: The giraffish pattern on the wallpaper was eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The giraffish grace of the ballerina captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The giraffish behavior of the tall man amused the children.
meanings.sent4: Her giraffish strides across the field were elegant and smooth.
meanings.sent5: The giraffish design of the building made it stand out in the cityscape.
